title: The Intouchables
synopsis: Based on a true story, a quadriplegic aristocrat's world is turned upside down when he hires a good-humored ex-con as his caretaker.

title: Amelie
synopsis: When impish Amélie finds a long-hidden trove of toys behind a baseboard in her apartment, she's inspired to return the items to their original owner.

title: Blue Is the Warmest Color
synopsis: Determined to fall in love, 15-year-old Adele is focused on boys. But it's a blue-haired girl she meets on the street who really piques her interest.

title: Incendies
synopsis: Twins Jeanne and Simon journey to the Middle East to find their father and brother and attempt to reconstruct their family's hidden history.

title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
synopsis: Mathieu Amalric stars as author and Elle magazine editor Jean-Dominique Bauby, who suffered a stroke in 1995 that rendered him mute and paralyzed.

title: Amour
synopsis: An elderly couple finds their time-tested love challenged by the rigors of one's fading health in this 2012 Cannes Film Festival Palme d'Or winner.

title: La Vie en Rose
synopsis: This poignant drama centers on legendary Parisian singer Édith Piaf, whose passion for music saw her through a life filled with tragedy.

title: Taxi
synopsis: A taxi driver becomes a police inspector's on-call chauffeur after receiving a huge speeding ticket. They soon bond over crime and high-speed chases.

title: Paris, Je T'aime
synopsis: Paris comes to life in this whimsical patchwork of 18 five-minute shorts united by a common theme: love in the City of Lights.

title: Love Me If You Dare
synopsis: Two friends grow up attempting to outdo the other with a chain of extreme pranks. When their relationship escalates to romance, the game turns harsh.

title: District 13
synopsis: An elite-unit cop and a former thug attempt to retrieve a stolen nuke and foil a terrorist attack inside a lawless, sealed-off ghetto in Paris.

title: La Femme Nikita
synopsis: Recruited against her will into a secret government organization, a ruthless street junkie is transformed into a seductive lethal weapon.

title: High Tension
synopsis: Students Marie and Alex have no idea of the horrors that await them when they head off to a remote country home to study and a psychopath attacks.

title: Rust and Bone
synopsis: An unemployed kick boxer who's struggling as a single father strikes up a relationship with a whale trainer who survives a terrible accident.

title: Point Break
synopsis: Once a motocross star, a uniquely qualified FBI agent goes undercover to nab Zenic eco-terrorists who seek enlightenment by committing extreme heists.

title: The Chorus
synopsis: A music teacher lands a job at a boys' boarding school populated by delinquents and orphans, and sets out to rein them in through the power of song.

title: Elle
synopsis: A successful businesswoman who was brutally raped uses her own cunning and erotic imagination to track down her rapist without the help of police.

title: The Little Prince
synopsis: When an overscheduled girl befriends an eccentric aviator, he regales her with tales about the adventures of an unusual boy who lives on an asteroid.

title: Taxi 2
synopsis: Pizza delivery boy turned lead-foot taxi driver Daniel Morales is back in this installment of the fast-paced Taxi series penned by producer Luc Besson. This time around, Daniel is helping a French detective track down a yakuza gang.

title: Raw
synopsis: Forced to eat raw meat during a hazing ritual at her veterinary school, a young vegetarian develops an overpowering hunger for flesh in all its forms.

title: Asterix and Obelix: Mission Cleopatra
synopsis: History's favorite Gauls assist Queen Cleopatra when she wagers that the Egyptian people can build a palace for Julius Caesar in just three months.

title: District 13: Ultimatum
synopsis: Set two years after the action in District 13, this sequel follows Tomaso and Leito on a quest to clean up crime and corruption in the city.

title: Mommy
synopsis: Freewheeling widow Diane struggles to raise her emotionally disturbed teen son alone when a mysterious young neighbor steps in and offers to help.

title: Two Days, One Night
synopsis: On the verge of losing her job, Sandra comes up with a last-ditch strategy: get her workmates to give up their bonuses so that she can stay on.

title: TAXi 3
synopsis: Investigating a gang of thieves disguised as Santa Claus, Marseille cop Emilien once again gets speedy assistance from breakneck cab driver Daniel.

title: Coco Before Chanel
synopsis: Audrey Tautou stars as Gabrielle 'Coco' Chanel in this lively biopic that explores the orphan's storied ascension to fashion stardom.

title: Asterix and Obelix Take on Caesar
synopsis: An elixir brewed by resident druid Panoramix helps a tiny French town repel the Roman Empire -- till Julius Caesar's scheming aide abducts Panoramix.

title: Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis
synopsis: Banished to a small town in the boondocks of northern France, a postal manager struggles to adjust to life among the local 'barbarians.'

title: The Class
synopsis: In an inventive adaptation of his novel, François Bégaudeau stars as a passionate French teacher who presides over a classroom of diverse young minds.

title: The Tenant
synopsis: A timid file clerk moves into a run-down apartment with a disturbing history: The prior occupant jumped to her death from the dismal room's window.

title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au Bon Dieu?
synopsis: As a Catholic couple adapts to life with three sons-in-law of different faiths, their last unmarried daughter makes a big announcement.

title: Mesrine: Part 1: Killer Instinct
synopsis: After an incident in the army gives him his first taste of violent power, a notorious French gangster launches headlong into a harrowing career.

title: The Red Violin
synopsis: When a rare instrument crafted during the Italian Renaissance shows up at a modern auction, it reveals its mysterious history.

title: 22 Bullets
synopsis: Charly hasn't been in the killing business for years. But when he narrowly survives a hit on his own life, he comes out of retirement to get revenge.

title: Priceless
synopsis: A sweet-talker who makes a fortune hitting on rich men mistakenly puts the moves on a klutzy bartender and then must find a way to let him down easy.

title: Young and Beautiful
synopsis: Told in four seasons with four songs, this film portrays the coming of age of a French teenager, from her sexual awakening to exploring her identity.

title: 8 Women
synopsis: A family Christmas gathering is disrupted by the patriarch's murder, with his socialite wife, mother-in-law and an impudent maid among the suspects.

title: The Barbarian Invasions
synopsis: When middle-aged divorcé Rémy is hospitalized with terminal cancer, his estranged son returns home to make amends and help Rémy fight the illness.

title: Mesrine: Part 2: Public Enemy #1
synopsis: Paris police redouble their efforts against gangster and publicity-hungry celebrity Jacques Mesrine by forming a unit dedicated to stopping him.

title: The Kid with a Bike
synopsis: Deserted by his deadbeat dad, a disillusioned 11-year-old boy is virtually adopted by a caring hairdresser but soon falls in with a young drug dealer.

title: Asterix aux jeux olympiques
synopsis: Two hapless warrior heroes and their infatuated friend head for the Olympic Games, determined to compete and win the affections of a Greek princess.

title: Ruby and Quentin
synopsis: In this crime comedy, odd-couple outlaws Ruby and Quentin bust out of jail and hatch a scheme to avenge the death of Ruby's true love.

title: The Brand New Testament
synopsis: In this irreverent comedy, God torments humanity from his apartment in Brussels -- until his daughter rebels and texts everyone their date of death.

title: Heartbreaker
synopsis: Alex earns money by breaking up relationships, but when he falls for a client's daughter, he must decide whether to ruin her wedding to Mr. Right.

title: Little White Lies
synopsis: When Max and Vero's friend is seriously injured in an accident, they choose to go ahead with a planned birthday celebration at their beach house.

title: La Famille Bélier
synopsis: In a small French town, a hearing teen helps her deaf parents navigate life until her beautiful singing voice offers her the chance to go to Paris.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
synopsis: A store clerk and a mechanic fall in love in the coastal town of Cherbourg, but their romance is cut short when he is drafted into the army.

title: Russian Dolls
synopsis: When an opportunity comes along that could change would-be writer Xavier's luck, the down-and-out scribe knows he'd better not blow it.

title: The Returned
synopsis: On returning home and finding they're believed to be dead, a collection of near-strangers from the same village try to find a reason for their plight.

title: The Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec
synopsis: In 1912, a fearless young reporter named Adele Blanc-Sec goes to any lengths to achieve her goals, including traveling to Egypt to hunt for mummies.

title: A Monster in Paris
synopsis: Emile and Raoul join forces with a singer and an eccentric scientist and his monkey to save a misunderstood monster from the city's police chief.

title: Crimson Rivers 2: Angels of the Apocalypse
synopsis: The eccentric Inspector Niemans and his sidekick Reda take on a serial killer who's cutting a swath -- literally and figuratively -- through France.

title: Beauty and the Beast
synopsis: This lush take on the classic fairy tale follows a merchant's brave and beautiful daughter, who takes his place as a fearsome beast's prisoner.

title: Special Forces
synopsis: While covering the war in Afghanistan, journalist Elsa is kidnapped by the Taliban, and a Special Forces team races against time to rescue her.

title: It's Only the End of the World
synopsis: A gay man returns to his family after a 12-year absence to tell them he's dying and reencounters all the dysfunction and arguing that sent him away.

title: Venus in Fur
synopsis: After a long search, a Parisian writer-director has found the perfect woman to play the lead in a provocative play about masochistic relationships.

title: Starbuck
synopsis: A fortysomething slacker's life is turned upside down when he learns that his many sperm donations have resulted in more than 500 children.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
synopsis: Quick-witted Belgian reporter Tintin and his trusty pooch, Snowy, travel the world, tangling with thieves, kidnappers and killers.

title: Le Chef
synopsis: The friction between gourmet chef Alexandre Lagarde and his interfering boss threatens to ruin Lagarde's reputation and lose him his position.

title: Ernest and Celestine
synopsis: Adapted from a popular children's book series, this sweet animated drama portrays the friendship between an orphan mouse and a free-spirited bear.

title: My Life as a Zucchini
synopsis: A 9-year-old boy finds his life upended when he's sent to live in an orphanage in this stop-motion animated tale of loss, friendship and young love.

title: Timbuktu
synopsis: Fear grips the quiet city of Timbuktu when Islamic rebels seize the city and impose their extreme beliefs on the moderate Muslim population.

title: Of Gods and Men
synopsis: A group of French Trappist monks who make their home in the mountains of Algeria are taken captive by Islamic fundamentalists.

title: Mood Indigo
synopsis: Newlyweds Chloé and Colin find their young love tested when Chloé suffers a mysterious illness that causes a flower to grow in her lung.

title: Samba
synopsis: Brought together by desperate circumstances, a burned-out caseworker and an ambitious immigrant on the verge of deportation form a transcendent bond.

title: Point Blank
synopsis: Samuel's a nurse who saves the wrong guy -- a thief who takes Samuel's pregnant wife hostage to force him to spring his boss from the hospital.

title: Asterix: The 12 Tasks
synopsis: Julius Caesar issues a challenge to the Gauls: If they can complete 12 tasks, the Roman Empire is theirs. If they fail, they must submit to Caesar.

title: Chinese Puzzle
synopsis: In this third installment of director Cédric Klapisch's trilogy, newly divorced Xavier Rousseau follows his ex to the Big Apple, hoping to start over.

title: Delicacy
synopsis: A young widow, still grieving over the death of her husband years earlier, is slowly brought out of her shell by a caring and courtly male co-worker.

title: Rien à déclarer
synopsis: A Francophobic Belgian customs officer is forced to work alongside a Frenchman during the closure of customs posts along the Franco-Belge border.

title: RRRrrrr!!!
synopsis: The Clean Hair and Dirty Hair tribes have been warring over the possession of shampoo for 800 years in this goofball, prehistoric caveman comedy.

title: Asterix and Obelix: God Save Brittania
synopsis: Accompanied by loyal sidekick Obélix, plucky Gaul Astérix crosses the channel to help second cousin Anticlimax face Julius Caesar and invading Romans.

title: Populaire
synopsis: In this 1950s-set romantic comedy, an insurance agent encourages his secretary to enter speed-typing competitions -- and to move into his mansion.

title: Yves Saint Laurent
synopsis: Yves Saint Laurent becomes head designer at French fashion house Christian Dior, suffers a breakdown and meets his future life and business partner.

title: Yamakasi
synopsis: Seven daredevils who constantly test their abilities and the patience of the police use their skills to find a heart and a surgeon for a young fan.

title: Frantz

title: The Women on the 6th Floor
synopsis: When their maid unceremoniously quits, stodgy French businessman Jean-Louis and his socialite wife replace her with a vivacious Spanish lass.

title: Astérix: The Mansion of the Gods
synopsis: Diminutive comic-book hero Astérix and his oversized pal Obélix attempt to protect their Gaulish village from Roman invasion in this animated feature.

title: Happy End
synopsis: Estranged from one other and from the world outside, an affluent family in Calais channels its frustrations through harmful, dysfunctional behavior.

title: Asterix the Gaul
synopsis: As the Romans try to take over their village, Asterix and Obelix fight back with the help of a magic potion that gives them superhuman strength.

title: Chicken with Plums
synopsis: After the destruction of his favorite violin, a renowned musician in 1950s Tehran loses all taste for life and teeters on the edge of oblivion.

title: Farewell, My Queen
synopsis: As revolution threatens Louis XVI's reign, Marie Antoinette asks a lady in waiting to act as her decoy in the event of a sudden escape.

title: The Innocents
synopsis: At the end of World War II, a French doctor with the Red Cross treats nuns at a Polish convent who were raped and impregnated by Russian soldiers.

title: A Perfect Plan
synopsis: To break her family's curse of first marriages ending in divorce, Isabelle searches for a stranger to wed before moving on to the man she loves.

title: Welcome

title: High Lane
synopsis: A trail closed to the rest of civilization becomes a path to adventure and horror for a group of friends who dare to go beyond its barriers.

title: Me, Myself and Mum

title: Superchondriac
synopsis: When his best friend dies suddenly and he's mistaken for a Third World revolutionary, a hypochondriac shutterbug finds his life dive into a tailspin.

synopsis: Disillusioned with life at school and at home, a cynical teenager drops out, joins a gang and begins an arduous search for independence.

synopsis: A handyman named Germaine befriends 95-year-old Margueritte and finds himself bewildered by the literature that gives Margueritte such pleasure.

synopsis: Famed fashion designer Coco Chanel -- reeling from the death of her beau -- meets and falls for Russian composer Igor Stravinsky in 1920s Paris.

title: Breathe
synopsis: A teenager finds an escape from her unhappy home life when she meets a charismatic new student, but their friendship grows increasingly toxic.

synopsis: A middle-aged French journalist befriends two prostitutes whose strong personalities cause her to reevaluate her own bourgeois life.

synopsis: A guilt-ridden doctor in a Belgian town tries to uncover the identity of a woman who died after being turned away from her office.

title: Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart
synopsis: Equipped with a mechanical heart and determined to stay out of death's shadow, young Jack understands that love could prove fatal.

synopsis: A lawyer begins to fall for an architect she met on the phone, but their difference in size creates friction with her family -- and her jealous ex.

synopsis: Rare or never-seen footage has been colorized and remastered in high definition to create this visually arresting chronicle of World War II.

synopsis: This six-part series chronicles World War II from the rise of the Nazis to the Japanese surrender, with in-depth profiles of key figures on all sides.

title: The Prey
synopsis: When the loot he stashed away from a big heist is compromised, imprisoned thief Franck Adrien has no choice but to break out of jail to safeguard it.

synopsis: A shameless chauvinist gets a taste of his own medicine when he wakes up in a world dominated by women and locks horns with a powerful female author.

title: Ravenous
synopsis: As a zombie plague ravages their rural Quebec town, a scrappy band of survivors join forces to flee the infected hordes in this quiet thriller.

title: Lila Says

synopsis: When the old guardian of the moon retires, the mischievous Mune is chosen as his successor, but he worries he's not up to the job.

title: Marguerite

synopsis: Toprak, who lost her baby, is hired as a wet nurse for wealthy Yusuf's motherless son. Yusuf is drawn to Toprak, but also to her scheming sister.

title: Being 17

synopsis: A free-spirited woman in a marriage of convenience finds an outlet for her desires when she travels to the Alps on her doctor's orders.

synopsis: When a vivacious French grad student unexpectedly gets pregnant, she and her boyfriend scramble to make sense of the new path their lives have taken.

synopsis: Supremely confident and boastful JC has a knack for attracting women, so he sets out to help his best pal, meek and unassuming Stef, find true love.

title: Leaving
synopsis: A housewife decides to revive her physiotherapy career. But when she meets the man who's building her backyard office, sparks fly -- dangerously.

synopsis: After her son is caught filming himself masturbating at school, his mother rounds up the whole family to discuss their sexual issues.

synopsis: This biopic of explorer, innovator, ecologist and filmmaker Jacques Cousteau delves into his adventures, ambitions -- and his troubled relationships.

title: Papa ou Maman
synopsis: Offered dream promotions at work, a divorcing couple fight tooth and nail to lose child custody so that they can pursue their respective careers.

title: The Assault
synopsis: The events of a hijacking on Christmas Eve unfold from the perspectives of a terrorist, a special ops trooper and a foreign ministry analyst.

title: Vive la France
synopsis: To put his unknown country on the map, a dictator sends two naive shepherds to carry out a terror attack in Paris -- but they have way too much fun.

title: Black
synopsis: With shades of 'Romeo and Juliet,' this modern-day fable focuses on two teens from rival gangs who develop an impossible attraction.

title: The French Kissers
synopsis: Hervé, a shy high schooler who spends all his time obsessing about girls, can't believe it when attractive classmate Aurore develops a crush on him. But trying to score with this cutie leads the sex-crazed teen to suffer endless humiliation.

title: Slack Bay
synopsis: An unlikely bond develops between two eccentric families as police investigate a string of small-town disappearances in this surreal French comedy.

title: Lolo
synopsis: When Violette arrives home in Paris accompanied by a new lover she met on holiday, her 20-year-old son sets about trying to undermine the romance.

title: Dior et Moi
synopsis: In this behind-the-scenes peek at the demanding world of fashion, Christian Dior artistic director Raf Simons designs his first couture collection.

title: Immoral Tales
synopsis: This anthology illustrates the timeless nature of desire in four stories of incest, bloodlust and other forbidden subjects.

title: A Christmas Special: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir
synopsis: Parisian teen Marinette transforms herself into superhero Ladybug to find her lonely secret crush Adrien when he runs away from home at Christmas.

title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir
synopsis: When Paris is in peril, Marinette becomes Ladybug. Little does she know, her school crush Adrien is actually Cat Noir, another city-saving superhero.

title: Once Upon a Time... Man
synopsis: Tag along on a journey of discovery as a family travels from caves to pyramids to modern cities in this classic animated series about human history.

title: Nocturama
synopsis: After planting bombs in the streets of Paris, a group of disillusioned young people spends a tense night holed up in a high-end department store.

title: 17 Girls
synopsis: Seventeen teenage girls at a school in small-town France become pregnant at the same time, baffling the adults -- and the boys -- in their lives.

title: Bastards
synopsis: A tanker captain devises a plan for vengeance when his sister's husband kills himself and the family company goes bankrupt thanks to a sleazy tycoon.

title: The Adversary
synopsis: After 18 years of calculated deception, a respected doctor and father attempts to avoid being exposed in this drama inspired by a true story.

title: The Missing Picture
synopsis: In the film version of his harrowing memoir, director Rithy Panh uses ceramic figures to represent the Cambodian masses murdered in the 1970s.

title: My Golden Days
synopsis: Middle aged anthropologist Paul Dédalus reflects on his difficult childhood, a meaningful student trip to the USSR, his friends and his one true love.

title: Chrysalis
synopsis: While investigating a human trafficking case, cop David Hoffmann uncovers a clinic run by professor Brügen, whose research involves dream control.

title: Bastille Day
synopsis: After a mix-up lands him in hot water, a skilled pickpocket is forced to help a no-nonsense CIA operative track a terrorist group in Paris.

title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
synopsis: Wimpy blue cat Oggy would like nothing more than to snooze, but he's constantly bothered by the three ugly cockroaches who have invaded his home.

title: My Summer in Provence
synopsis: In the wake of their parents' separation, three siblings spend the summer in the south of France with their estranged grandfather.

synopsis: This thought-provoking documentary looks at the effects of mechanization and globalization on fishermen, farmers, consumers and the environment.

title: Camille Rewinds
synopsis: This time-bending drama revolves around Camille, a 40-year-old devastated by the breakup of her long romance with Eric, her childhood sweetheart.

title: Hippocrates: Diary of a French Doctor
synopsis: In a Paris hospital, a young man with medical aspirations becomes an intern in a ward run by his father and quickly starts learning the hard way.

title: The Lady in the Car with Glasses and a Gun
synopsis: When a woman takes her boss's car on a seaside joyride, locals in a town she's never been to claim to know her, and a dead body turns up in the trunk.

synopsis: This study of the Grande Chartreuse monastery follows the daily activities of the resident monks, whose silence is broken only by prayer and song.

title: La Mante
synopsis: Decades after her capture, a serial killer offers to help solve a string of copycat murders -- but only if her son, now a cop, will work by her side.

title: On My Way
synopsis: Prompted by a post-midlife crisis, Bettie goes out for cigarettes and decides to keep on driving, on a quest toward reinvention.

title: Diary of a Chambermaid
synopsis: An attractive young woman goes to work as a chambermaid for a troublesome couple. The wife is unreasonable, and the husband won't stop hitting on her.

title: Bang Gang
synopsis: A group of bored teenagers participate in increasingly wild sex games but discover that their emotions can't be controlled as easily as their bodies.

title: Ares

title: In the Shadow of Iris

title: Microbe and Gasoline
synopsis: Keen to escape the ennui of daily life, two teen misfits build a makeshift vehicle and embark on a road trip filled with bizarre encounters.
An armored truck guard snubbed by his boss exacts revenge by taking off with millions of euros in the perfect heist.

title: Rocco
synopsis: Italian porn star Rocco Siffredi is showcased in this documentary that shadows the legendary performer during his final year in front of the camera.

title: The Break

title: Heal the Living
synopsis: After a sunrise surfing trip ends in tragedy, a family's sudden loss becomes one woman's hope for survival.

title: Steak
synopsis: Georges tries to join a gang of milk-drinking hoodlums, but the arrival of a friend who took a murder rap for him could ruin everything.

title: Made in France

title: Sex, Love and Therapy

title: Fathers and Guns

title: Nouvelle adresse
synopsis: After learning her cancer has returned, journalist and single mom Nathalie Lapointe struggles to tell her family the news and prepare for the future.

title: Le Clan
synopsis: A former criminal on witness protection adopts a new identity and rebuilds his life, which soon unravels when old accomplices return to settle scores.

title: Rose and the Captain
synopsis: As World War II rages in Europe, a woman living on the French colonial isle of Martinique finds herself in a position to spy on a German officer.

title: La boule noire
synopsis: In a small French town in 1979, a supermarket manager barred from joining an exclusive club becomes obsessed with finding out who voted against him.

title: Sparring
synopsis: A middle-aged boxer with a mixed record becomes a champion's sparring partner while dreaming of one last chance to end his career with a victory.

title: La théorie du K.O.
synopsis: While two children and an unruly father keep him on his toes, a widower finds solace in friendship and purpose in the wrestling ring.

title: SamSam
synopsis: With the help of his flying saucer, magic cape and space ray, pint-sized superhero SamSam fights monsters and other bad guys.

title: Do Me Love
synopsis: A young woman reawakens sexual desire in an unhappily married middle-aged man, but the affair soon spirals out of control.

title: Scratch
synopsis: An inexperienced armored truck driver is caught between gangsters who want to rob her truck, and co-workers who wish to do the same.

title: Vertige
synopsis: Waking from a coma, a young woman pieces together the truth behind her suspicious fall from a roof as different versions of the story emerge.

title: Les Hommes viennent de Mars, les femmes de Vénus
synopsis: Paul Dewandre adapts best-selling author John Gray's 'Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus' book about the sexes into an illuminating one-man show.

title: Incorruptible
synopsis: In the streets of Senegal, a youth movement rises up against a regime bent on retaining power in this chronicle of the nation's stormy 2012 elections.

title: Tightrope
synopsis: This MMA fighting documentary focuses on the 'Outsider' series, where orphans, runaways and other marginalized Japanese youths take a shot at glory.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in den Alpen
synopsis: Sarah Wiener visits the Alps to see fighting cows, learn from local fishermen, hunt chamois and try local dishes that she'll later prepare herself.

title: La Femme
synopsis: Personal desires guide the lives of a marriage-averse entrepreneur, a housewife coping with infidelity and a career woman who leaves her spouse.

title: Stranger
synopsis: A prosecutor without empathetic abilities, along with a bold female police detective, takes on a murder case involving rampant political corruption.

title: Kanak
synopsis: Torn between loyalty to his island home and the opportunity to play overseas, soccer phenom Christian Karembeu searches for his identity.

title: Rire Et Chatiment
synopsis: An egocentric osteopath can't live without his practical jokes -- until his wife gets fed up and someone dies laughing. Time for introspection.

title: Dog of War
synopsis: A young French officer of Algerian descent finds re-entry into civilian life difficult in the wake of active service in Afghanistan.

title: Le nouveau protocole
synopsis: When his son dies under suspicious circumstances, a lumberjack sets out to find the truth and uncovers clues pointing to a pharmaceutical conspiracy.

title: Elles étaient en guerre (1914-1918)
synopsis: Trace the overlapping journeys of exceptional women swept up in World War I and hear their tales of bravery on history's front lines.

title: Seven and Me
synopsis: A little girl discovers she’s the modern-day descendant of Snow White when seven dwarves arrive at her suburban home to serve as her guardian angels.

title: The Truth
synopsis: A devious businessman covets his partner's priceless treasure map, while a related murder case calls into question some biological family ties.

title: Fanfan la Tulipe
synopsis: To avoid a forced betrothal, a hotheaded 18th century seducer joins the king's army, where he finds love and glory, according to a fake prophesy.

title: Plan B
synopsis: Action star wannabes hoping to be casted at an audition find themselves in the crossfire of a criminal conspiracy involving a Berlin kingpin.
